description:
After crash-landing on a frozen
mountain Raj makes an incredible
discovery in Jewel Quest 6: The
Sapphire Dragon! Explore the Temple
of Wishes, an ancient complex thought
to be only a legend, and take on a
gang of ruthless pirates. Solve
action-packed Jewel Boards and
challenge yourself with bonus levels
as you explore the entire globe. Play
as different characters with unique
abilities and tackle new challenges in
Jewel Quest 6: The Sapphire Dragon!
name:
Jewel Quest
The Sapphire Dragon
